text: Jefferson Randolph "Soapy" Smith II (November 2, 1860 - July 8, 1898) was an American confidence trickster and gangster. He was a major figure in organized crime in Colorado and Skagway, Alaska. He was born in Coweta County, Georgia. He was killed in a shootout in Skagway when he was 37. ==References== Category:1860 births Category:1898 deaths Category:American gangsters Category:Deaths by firearm in the United States Category:People from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Soapy Smith
